title: Pair of Leg Wraps
description: long black wraps with 3/4\" red and grey cross stitched embroidery; bottom edge selvedge; green and tan striped ribbon ties on one end of each; embroidery on each ends 14\" before end
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
